== Main inclusion report for ttf-sil-charis ==

=== Requirements ===

1. ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/t/ttf-sil-charis/ (with updated version http://yosch.org/packages/ubuntu/) : available for all supported architectures

2. ''Rationale:'' font-family with wide Unicode coverage (+3000 glyphs) for almost any Roman/Cyrillic-based writing system + smart features for linguists using state-of-the-art complex scripts technologies (Opentype, Graphite). Useful for many locales.

3. ''Security:''
* No CANs.
* No Secunia record.
* Just fonts, no binaries.

4. ''QA:''
* Installation: Fonts, no user configuration needed
* Good maintenance in Debian via Alioth project
* Active upstream

* Bugs: 
** No Debian bugs.
** No bugs in Ubuntu bugzilla.
** No bugs in Malone.

5. ''Standards compliance:''
* Standard debhelper packaging.
* FHS met.
* Debian package and library policy met.
